quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.line: Everybody, can I please have your attention? Ryan and I have a huge announcement.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: Oh my gosh!

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: Wow.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.line: Over the weekend, Ryan Bailey Howard and I got divorced. [throws ring on the ground]

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.line: Sweet! Free Ring!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Divorced?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: Just so you know, it's totally amicable. We're fine. We don't need people here to take sides.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.line: The last thing that we want is any kind of drama.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Wait. Can you back up? What's the story?

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.line: We were having a beautiful weekend in the Poconos. We were making love, constantly. We saw the sunrise. Ryan was crying a lot.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: It's not irrelevant. Details

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.line: And in the morning we walked by a chapel and we stopped, suddenly, and Ryan said...

quotes.speaker: Ryan and Kelly
quotes.line: I don't think I should be married to you anymore.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: What?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Sorry, when did you get married?

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.line: Ummm, like a week ago, we got really wasted and it just felt right.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: And you didn't invite any of us?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: We are getting divorced, Andy! This is such a raw time.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.line: God baby, you know, people's reactions to this... maybe we made a mistake.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: No, with the messed up laws in this country, I don't want to be married until everyone can be married.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: You know what Ryan, I talked to the other gay guys, and we're ok with it. We agree it's fine if you got married.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: No Oscar, Not, not until everyone can!

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.line: Ryan, I changed my mind.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: Ok fine, you know what, this actually isn't amicable at all and we actually do need people to take sides. Who is on my side?

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.line: And who is on my side? [no one raises their hand]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: All right. Bye.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Bye.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Let's Go!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Just a minute. How long do we have to wait?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: For what?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: You broke up with AJ weeks ago.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Don't you have a sales call to go on?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I don't understand. I really don't. I mean, we know we are going to start dating. Why not now?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: We don't know that.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Sure we do.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Why is it such a certainty that we are supposed to be together?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Why does the sun rise in the morning? Why do magnets stick together? Because everybody says so. Everybody.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Michael, I can't keep getting into a situation where I date whoever I'm working with. Well, you can understand that.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Yeah, I understand. I just don't agree.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Well you don't have to agree.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Yes I do.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: No you don't.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Yes I do.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: No, you can have your own opinion.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I have my own opinion and my opinion is to disagree with you.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: He's going to be a lot of fun to drive around in a car with.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Aw you'll get through it hon. Just make a game out of it. A funny "Jim" game.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: That's it? That's all I get? Even after all the hard work I put into celebrating your talent today?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: All right, what'd you do?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Well, those things that you consider doodles, I consider art.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Where'd you put it?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Where'd I put what?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Let's go.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Oh, sorry gotta go.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Say it. Where?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Ok fine, three hints. One! When you are getting colder, you're really getting warmer.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: The fridge.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Two! You have a better chance, if you think Bob Vance.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: The fridge, got it.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: And the final clue...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Let's go!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: You know what, just think about it, you'll be fine.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Bye.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: Holly is ruining Michael's life. He thinks she is so special. And she's so not. Her personality is like a 3. Her sense of humor is a 2. Her ears are like a 7and a 4. Add it all up and what do you get? 16. And he treats her like she's a perfect 40. It's nuts.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Cheer up. We made a sale.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Just drive faster. I want to get back.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Well, I'm going the speed limit. So...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Okay, fine. My feelings don't matter to you. What matters to you is your precious speed limit.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Someone's in a bad mood.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: No I'm not. I'm not in a bad mood. I'm not, Jim. Hello? Ok fine, ignore me. Have it your way. Let's just talk about you, as always. Is sex different after the baby, Jim?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Alright, let me turn on some music.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I need to pee.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: No you don't.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Yeah, I do. My word against yours.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Alright. Well we'll be there in ten minutes.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: What part of "I need to pee" do you not understand? I'm upset. My bladder is full. There is no telling what I might do right now all over the inside of your precious little car.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Alright, Well if I see a gas station, I'll pull over.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Well I hope I make it.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Hello?

quotes.speaker: Helen
quotes.line: Hi Jim, it's Helen.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Hey Helen. Is everything ok?

quotes.speaker: Helen
quotes.line: Everything is fine. Baby's fine. She has a tiny fever. I'm taking her for a check up. Nothing to worry about.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Ok...

quotes.speaker: Helen
quotes.line: A tiny thing. I locked her in the car.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: What?

quotes.speaker: Helen
quotes.line: She's smiling. She's happy.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Oh my God.

quotes.speaker: Helen
quotes.line: Jim, I don't have a spare key.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Just stay there. I'll be there in one second. Michael! Michael! Excuse me, sir there is a guy in the bathroom. He's coming out but I have to go because it's an emergency. Will you just tell him call the office. Just call the office! Thank you. Please?

quotes.speaker: Guy
quotes.line: [towards bathroom] Hello? [gives up and drives off]

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: This is Pam.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Hey it's me. So uh, don't worry. Everything's ok.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: What's wrong?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Nothing. Absolutely nothing. You're not holding a cup of coffee or anything are you?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Jim, what?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Uh, so, Cece had a little bit of a fever. And your mom also locked her in the car.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Oh God! What?!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: No no no it's ok. So, Cece is with daddy now. She's laughing and she's happy. And we are on our way to see Dr. Barbra.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Ok. She's ok?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Yes, and your mom got a very well deserved day off. So here's the thing though. I left Michael at the gas station on Benet.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Understood.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: And his wallet and phone are on the seat next to me.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Got it. I will put out a A.P.B. Otherwise known as a "Ask Pam Beasley". ... Did the phone cut off?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Nope.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Alright, just call me after the doctor.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Ok. Bye.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Bye.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I know, I know you have a phone policy. I understand. But this is an emergency because my friend isn't here and I am worried that he has been abducted.

quotes.speaker: Attendant
quotes.line: No, he ditched you man. I saw him drive away.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: There is no way he ditched me. There is no way that happened. He's my... Ok. May I please just use your phone? Please!

quotes.speaker: Attendant
quotes.line: Just make it quick.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Ok. I will make it quick. I will make it very quick. [opens phone] And you don't have my numbers on speed dial. Ah, Ok. What is it?

quotes.speaker: Attendant
quotes.line: You don't know it.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: You know what, I can dial 411, get Jim's number.

quotes.speaker: Attendant
quotes.line: He left you here on purpose. All right? I saw it. He just drove away.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Actually this is good. I am going to take this opportunity to go walk-about. Good. Good. [to cameras] Nope, get away. No, that's enough. Ok.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: It's the gas station on Benet Street?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Ok.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: You know what? Why don't you stay and I'll go?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Oh no no no. I'll be fine.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: It's kind of a sketchy neighborhood though. I better come along.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Problem solved everyone. Space Orphan and Princess Nincompoop are off to rescue Michael. Unbelievable. I'm going. You drive, I got a car full of fox meat.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Cute. [enters office area] Very funny, everyone. Who wrote captions under my doodle? I'm not even kidding. They're pretty good.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Which on in particular?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Yeah, which one?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Well the first one has a surprise factor. "I'm a suck suck-suckidy Sabre!"

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Boo-yea! [office laughs]

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: No no. No no no.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: But, ah, I suppose the second one is the better written line.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: You suppose?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: What's it say?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: "I'm suppose to be wearing red gloves but my color cartridge portal, got jammed again."

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Ok. [office laughs] No no no.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Red gloves.

quotes.speaker: Darrly
quotes.line: Keep it real.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: You guys, if I knew you wanted to do a caption contest, I would have drawn something more challenging.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: And I will take you all down.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: You?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: I've been reading the comics to my daughter since she was three years old. Not once I have used the real captions to Family Circus. That crazy family is hilarious to her for one reason: me.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Oh it is on like Genghis Khan wearing Sean Jean in Buton.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Yes. You guys, I have the perfect idea. Ok, it will just take me ten minutes.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Woo-hoo.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: I can't wait.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Male. Caucasian. Forties. Black hair. Facial type: marsupial.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: He answers to Michal. Michal G. Scott. Michael J. Fox. Mr. Fox. The Incredible Mr. Fox.

quotes.speaker: Attendant
quotes.line: Yeah, he just left.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Which way did he go?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Hey hey hey. Let me answer this. Stupid question. He went back to the office, obviously, which is that way.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Oh really? You don't think he walked by the bakery just for the smell of it?

quotes.speaker: Attendant
quotes.line: She's right. He went that way.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Alright. Don't get a swelled head. You're no tracker.  [Dwight and Erin low-five] Let's ride.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: [at puppies] Hey you guys. Listen to me. Don't get hung up on just one girl because there are a whole lot of other girls out there. Look over there. See? They look cute. [at parrots] Hello! You guys are so beautiful. You're so colorful. I wish I could understand you. That's a metaphor I guess. [at snake] You are disgusting. You'll never find love. Yekkk. [holding puppy] Do you think she needs more time or is it never going to happen? [licks his nose] I'm being serious. Seriously.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: [on phone] Dunder Mifflin, this is Pam.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Has Michael checked in?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Oh, hey Dwight.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: I asked you a question.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: No, he hasn't.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Goodbye.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: No, wait. Hey, while you are out, could pick up some paper towels and chocolate syrup? We have ice cream so I thought...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Pam, this isn't a shopping trip.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: No.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: This is a man-hunt slash rescue mission.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Ok. I, just, when you are done or any time it's convent, I just thought since you are out...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Pam, I'm obviously going to get that stuff for you so just shut up.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Ok, well it wasn't obvious so... [phone hangs up]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: No word from Michael.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Oh.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Ta-da!

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Ok, it's two giant dogs with two giant palm trees on a regular size island.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Ok. I got one.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Yeah?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Yes!

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Ok, I'm sorry but I am going to have to shut this down.

quotes.speaker: Office
quotes.line: Boo!

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.line: Why?

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Unless we can all agree to some ground rules. It's either that or I can fax this to Joe and let her decide how to proceed.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: Gabe, tell us your stupid rules so we can start the game.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Number one, and this should be obvious, no captions that insult the company we work for.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Irony is such a critical...

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Number two: no pop culture references.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Seriously?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Wow.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: I think we can all agree that they tend to alienate those who don't get the reference, making them feel like the other.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: Wrap it up, Gabe.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Ok final thing, and this is a fun one: Instead of writing the caption directly under the picture, let's all try using Sticky Quips. All right? New, from Dunder Mifflin Sabre.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Sticky Quips are fun. They are safe. They are handy. I like to use Sticky Quips as regular Post-It notes when I am in a fun mood. [laughs] Not every day.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Go get 'em. Start quipin'.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Pam, I think I'm going to send you an IM.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Oh! Ok.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: Send me one too.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Yeah, yeah. Put me on that.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: C.C

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Ditto.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Hello. I would like a hot dog please. Now, I don't have any money so here is what I would like to do. I leave you here with my watch, and I come back later to pay for the hot dog.

quotes.speaker: Hot Dog Guy
quotes.line: I'm not a pawn shop.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Well I understand that but this is a $45 watch.

quotes.speaker: Hot Dog Guy
quotes.line: Wow.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: With that I can buy... half the menu.

quotes.speaker: Hot Dog Guy
quotes.line: I can't just go giving away hot dogs.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: All right. What do you do with the hog dogs that you don't sell?

quotes.speaker: Hot Dog Guy
quotes.line: Throw 'em away.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Well, okay, instead of throwing them all away later, why don't you just throw one away now into my mouth?

quotes.speaker: Hot Dog Guy
quotes.line: No.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Okay. You've just lost my business.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Hey.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: Hey, you were in there forever.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: There's too many brands. Where's Holly?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: She wandered off like an idiot.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Hey!

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Hey.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: What are you doing?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Oh, just changing my cell phone plan. Okay. Okay. Here you go.  I'll take my free stress ball too now.

quotes.speaker: Cell Phone Sales Person
quotes.line: Sure thing. Here you go, Miss... Okay, Fanny Smellmore. Real original.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: What?

quotes.speaker: Cell Phone Sales Person
quotes.line: You know what? Say hi to Orville Tootenbacher for me.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Tootenbacher.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: Orville Tootenbacher. That's Michael's millionaire character that...

quotes.speaker: Dwight and Erin
quotes.line: farts popcorn.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Of course. He was here. She's the key. Amazing. Holly. Hey, where you would you like to go next? Holly?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Are their egg rolls really that big?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh, boy. That was yummy. Thank you so much. You know what? I think I left my wallet in my car. Do you mind if I run out and get it?

quotes.speaker: Waiter
quotes.line: No problem.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Okay. I'll be right back. [goes to leave but walks back]. Okay. You know what? I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I don't have my wallet and I was gonna try to dine and dash and that was stupid and I realize I can't do that to you fine people.

quotes.speaker: Waiter
quotes.line: So you can't pay for your food?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Well I can, but I will have to come back later tonight and pay you. But the point is I did the right thing.

quotes.speaker: Waiter
quotes.line: You did not. You have no money. And you dined so much.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Well the number three is not such a giant feast.

quotes.speaker: Waiter
quotes.line: [calling to the back] Mr. Chu!

quotes.speaker: Micahel
quotes.line: Okay, all right. You know what?

quotes.speaker: Waiter
quotes.line: You were trying to steal food from us?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I am not. I just have had a bad day.  And I... okay. I'll be back later with the money. I'm just gonna leave right now.

quotes.speaker: Waiter
quotes.line: You can't. We'll stop you.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Well, I think I can get through the door.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Excuse me Do you speak English? We are looking for a man. Michael, this tall, black hair, Caucasian...

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: [point to picture] It's Michael!

quotes.speaker: Waiter
quotes.line: He just left.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: You knew.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: What? No. Dwight asked if I wanted an egg roll. What... what are you implying?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Uncanny. Put a pin in that. [to waiter] Which way did he go? That guy! When he leave here, which way did he go? We looking for him. [pointing] This way, this way, this way? I don't know. Do you know?

quotes.speaker: Waiter
quotes.line: I think he was heading downtown.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: He's heading downtown.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: So what, no one's even gonna try?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Guess not.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Oh, come on. My rules could not possibly have been that oppressive.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: You crushed our spirits, Gabe. Congrats. You're a big man, huh? Take a lot to destroy the creativity of a whole group of people. [notification tone] [laughter]

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Hey...

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.line: [whispers] Click the "x"

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: [whispers] I'm clicking!

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.line: In the box.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: I am clicking.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.line: Woman, you've had a computer for years!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Phyllis!

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Too late! Oh. Ha. An IM chat. Very clever. I'll just print that out. Come on guys. Grow up. I don't want to be your babysitter.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Oooohhh.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: "Darn it Bob. I told you not to buy a Sabre brand lifeboat." [laughter]

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Nice!

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: No, not nice. Terrible. Doesn't even include the fact that they're dogs.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Do the next one.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: "Wake up, Fred. The power cord on your Sabre printer shocked you into a coma, and you're dreaming you're a dog on a desert island.'

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: Dreaming he's a dog on a island.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Uh, excuse me, excuse me. How does the speaker know what the guy in the coma is dreaming?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: Well, if you think it's so easy, Gabe, why don't you try it?

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Umm... "You don't have to sniff my rear end anymore, Bob, I'm the only one here." Ha.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: That's tasteless, Gabe.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Tasteless?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Tasteless.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: More tasteless than this..."is that a palm tree or did Gabe get skinnier? Either way, let's pee on it."  [laughter]

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Ladies and gentlemen, I think we have a winner.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: Yes.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Yes, well done!

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Who's is it? Who wrote that?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: Yeah, who wrote it?

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.line: Please. It was easy once I decided I wanted the dog to piss on Gabe.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: Where did he go, Holly?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: I have no idea.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Do you see a little clown that you want to follow, huh? Is there a little bird that's chirping to you, "this way, this way"?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: I don't know.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Okay, close your eyes, we need you to think. What is Michael seeing right now? Can you tell him that we miss him? Michael we're coming for you!

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Will you stop! There has been a few coincidences, that's all.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: All right then. Someone propose a plan.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: Okay. We fan out...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Not you, Erin.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Stop looking at me like that. Okay, let's just go up somewhere high and see if we could spot him on the street below.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: That is the stupidest idea I've ever heard. No. Tap into your common mind and tell us what he would do next.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Look, I'm not playing. I'm gonna go look for him.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: Good. We don't need her.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Right.  I can do this on my own. I can think like Michael. All right... I'm deep below the ocean's surface in a submarine. A torpedo's coming right at me. No. Damn it, that's just my own imagination.  Maybe he's bowling.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: [walks to the roof of a building and spots Michael] Michael?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Hi. [laughs] How did you know I was up here?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: What are you doing up here?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I got turned around. I thought I could see Dunder Mifflin.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Dunder Mifflin.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Yeah. [laughs] Wow. I just miss you so much.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: I missed you too.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Really?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Can I kiss you?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Okay.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: Maybe that's not the best one. Keep reading.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Uh, it was.

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.line: Maybe it wasn't.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: "Oh, thank God. I had a horrible nightmare that I was stuck in America with Gabe."

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Oh! [laughter]

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: No, that's not the one I was thinking of. Keep going.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: "I know what it smells like but I didn't roll in anything. It's from listening to all of Gabe's bull[bleep]. [laughter] "Isn't this the perfect romantic getaway, Erin? Sitting on a deserted island wearing dog costumes? I'm Gabe and I'm a weirdo."

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: [laughs]

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: "Gabe's mom... hmm... Gabe's mom? Wait. Tall woman? Looks like Gabe? Yeah, I banged her."

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: Yeah, there you go. [laughter]
